bill.title: DFA Office of Shared Services; create to centralize business functions of state agencies.
bill.description: An Act To Establish An Office Of Shared Services (oss) In The Department Of Finance And Administration; To Provide That Beginning On July 1, 2011, The Office Of Shared Services Shall Establish A Central Business Office For All State Agencies In The State To Provide Shared Business Services; To Require The Office Of Shared Services To Develop A Transition Plan To Phase-in These Services Prior To July 1, 2015; To Require State Agencies To Comply With The Plan; To Authorize Fees For Services; To Amend Section 27-104-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; To Amend Section 25-9-107, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That All Employees And Service Functions Of The Office Of Shared Services Shall Be Exempt From State Service Until July 1, 2015; And For Related Purposes.
